tool_description: Find drug information about a drug at the national drug code (NDC) level.
name: fda_ndc_directory
title: fda_ndc_directory

api_list.name: Get MDRP data by NDC
api_list.description: Gets drug info about a particular drug in the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program with the national drug code (NDC) identifier.

api_list.name: Get MDRP data by Labeler Code
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a labeler code and returns all products that labeler (manufacturer) has in the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fda_ndc_directory.p.rapidapi.com/mdrp/labeler/23155"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fda_ndc_directory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fda_ndc_directory.p.rapidapi.com/mdrp/labeler/{labeler_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fda_ndc_directory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get FDA data by NDC
api_list.description: Gets FDA drug info with the national drug code (NDC) identifier.  The backend transforms the NDC parameter supplied and pulls back the FDA info at the the manufacturer-product level (9-digit NDC).
